Title: Frontend Developer
Description:
HouzeGuru is a young startup re-imagining the future of organized living by developing tools and platforms for Families to organize their lives better. We aspire to be India's 1st integrated intelligent home assistant for indian families. HouzeGuru, our inaugural flagship offering is a mobile app for both Android and iOS users. Please visit our website www.Houzeguru.com for more details.

Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include:

1. Utilize Flutter and Dart to develop innovative mobile applications for iOS and Android platforms.
2. Implement APIs to ensure seamless communication between frontend and backend systems.
3. Collaborate with the design team using Figma to create visually stunning user interfaces.
4. Conduct thorough testing and debugging to ensure high performance and reliability of applications.
5. Stay up-to-date with the latest industry trends and technologies to continuously improve development processes.
6. Assist in project planning and execution to meet deadlines and deliver exceptional results.
7. Contribute creative ideas and solutions to enhance the overall user experience of our products.

If you are a motivated self-starter with a strong foundation in frontend development, this internship opportunity is perfect for you! Apply now and be part of our dynamic team at HouzeGuru.

Title: Frontend Developer - NextJS
Description:
Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include:

1. Developing responsive and scalable web applications using React.js and Next.js
2. Interacting with REST APIs, specifically state management, for data handling and local storage.
3. Building and testing applications to ensure functionality and performance.
4. Documenting code, processes, and troubleshooting steps for future reference.

Title: Webflow Developer
Description:
Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include:

1. Design & development: Translate designs (often from Figma or other design tools) into functional and visually appealing websites using Webflow.
2. Responsive design: Ensure websites are responsive and provide a seamless user experience across various devices and browsers.
3. Webflow CMS: Set up, customize, and manage Webflow CMS collections.
